name: ew-cookie
description: Add cookie value to request-header and remove cookie

config.description: Add cookie value to request-header and remove cookie

scripts.build-bundle-json: cd built && echo '{"edgeworker-version":"'$npm_package_version'","description":"'$npm_package_config_description'"}' > bundle.json && npm run build-ew-tgz
scripts.build-ew-tgz: cd built && tar czvf ../dist/'ew_'$npm_package_config_ewid'_'$npm_package_version'.tgz' * && npm run activate-edgeworker
scripts.activate-edgeworker: npm run upload-edgeworker && akamai edgeworkers --section $npm_package_config_edgerc_section --accountkey $npm_package_config_accountswitchkey activate $npm_package_config_ewid staging $npm_package_version

author: jgrinwis@akamai.com
